ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: High Throughput Directed Sequencing Sequence Alignment/Map of SAMPLE:TCGA-36-1569-10A-01W-0615-10

PIPE_SECTION.NOTES: bfast match -A 1 -t -n 8 -f [path to reference] -T [temp directory] -r [path to fastq file]
bfast localalign -A 1 -t -n 8 -f [path to reference] -m [path to bfast matches file (bmf)]
bfast postprocess -f [path to reference] -i [path to baf file] -a 3 -O 1
java -jar -Xmx4g SamFormatConverter.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input sam path] OUTPUT=[output bam path] VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT
java -jar -Xmx4g MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input split bam path] OUTPUT=[output merge bam path] VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT
java -jar -Xmx4g SortSam.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input merge bam path] OUTPUT=[output sorted bam path] SORT_ORDER=coordinate VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT

java -jar -Xmx4g MarkDuplicates.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input sorted bam path] OUTPUT=[output marked dupes bam path] METRICS_FILE='./metric_file.picard' VERBOSITY=ERROR VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT

bfast localalign -A 1 -t -n 8 -f [path to reference] -m [path to bfast matches file (bmf)]
bfast postprocess -f [path to reference] -i [path to baf file] -a 3 -O 1
java -jar -Xmx4g SamFormatConverter.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input sam path] OUTPUT=[output bam path] VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT
java -jar -Xmx4g MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input split bam path] OUTPUT=[output merge bam path] VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT
java -jar -Xmx4g SortSam.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input merge bam path] OUTPUT=[output sorted bam path] SORT_ORDER=coordinate VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT

java -jar -Xmx4g MarkDuplicates.jar TMP_DIR=[temp directory] INPUT=[input sorted bam path] OUTPUT=[output marked dupes bam path] METRICS_FILE='./metric_file.picard' VERBOSITY=ERROR VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT

EXPERIMENT.TITLE: Whole Exome Sequencing of TCGA OVA samples

DESIGN.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Whole Exome Sequencing of TCGA OVA samples by hybrid selection

ANALYSIS.TITLE: Sequence Alignment/Map for TCGA Colon sample:TCGA-D5-7000-01A-11D-1924-10

PIPE_SECTION.NOTES: bwa sampe reference.fasta fastq1.sai fastq2.sai > output.sam
